name: Philia
overview: Philia is a point & click adventure game in the spirit of Myst. Philia is the sequel to Elansar. Explore three worlds and solve over 15 puzzles by trying to understand how they work, and enjoy a nice background loving story. Philia is available in English and French. Features 360° Panorama Mouse support More than 15 enigmas and puzzle to solve 2-Disc game VGA SUPPORT Higher definition support using VGA cable connection
